name: Read_EU_Access_Permission
description: This operation reads the currenty in the E-Rezept-Fachdienst registered Access Code for redeeming ePrescriptions in an EU country.

parameter.name: countryCode
parameter.documentation: The country for which the patient wants to grant access.

parameter.name: accessCode
parameter.documentation: The access code for that country.

parameter.name: validUntil
parameter.documentation: The instant until the access code is valid.

parameter.name: createdAt
parameter.documentation: The instant when the record was created in the E-Rezept-Fachdienst.
